com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller

Class SBEditKindsOfOperationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBEditKindsOfOperationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBEditKindsOfOperationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/edit/kindsOfOperation/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

        @Autowired
public SBEditKindsOfOperationController(SBKindOfOperationDao kindOfOperationDao,
                                                    SBKindOfOperationCustomDao kindOfOperationsCustomDao,
                                                    SBExpenseDao expenseDao,
                                                    SBUserDao userDao,
                                                    SBKindOfOperationValidator kindOfOperationValidator)
        An argument constructor autowired interfaces extending JpaRepository and Validator objects.
        Parameters:
        kindOfOperationDao - It provides methods related with 'sbkind_of_operation' table from database.
        kindOfOperationsCustomDao - It provides extra methods related with 'sbkind_of_operation' table from database.
        expenseDao - It provides methods related with 'sbexpense' table from database.
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        kindOfOperationValidator - It validates SBKindOfOperation object fields.
